name: Night Watch (itch) (itsVehx)
description:
Night Watch is a Tomb Raider with Spiderman inspired theme game. The player will play with a character in third person, where the goal of the game is to escape the area. The user is given advance movement mechanics to be able to jump across platform ledges. This demo was developed in Unreal Engine for the University of East London. Features of grapple mechanic and character movement are demonstrated in the Gameplay Video made.

For this project I have worked individually to program the mechanics for the game as well as showcase them in a demo where the movement can be used for future games developed. I was responsible for creating all the code and the audio. 

Focus of the project: Grapple Movement & Climbing System
